name: LD47 - Mad Wheel: Furry Maxster (PostLD Version)
name_original: LD47 - Mad Wheel: Furry Maxster (PostLD Version)
description:
Furry Maxster has found himself in the thunder wheel where he will dive and dash to save his life and entertain the crowd.

- Left and Right arrows : Dash left or right
- Down arrow : Dive under a tall obstacle
- + - : Change volume
- M : Mute music and or SFX!

/!\ This is a submission to LD47
